mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId, c.user_id AS userId, c.product_id AS productId, m.userName, p.product_name AS productName, c.amount, p.product_price AS productPrice, (product_price * amount) money FROM tbl_member2 m, tbl_product p, tbl_cart c WHERE m.userId = c.user_id AND p.product_id=c.product_id AND c.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY c.cart_id
